subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Now the Anaheim Ducks have steamrolled the top-seeded San Jose Sharks in the N.H.L.’s biggest playoff upset, who would dare say that Detroit Red Wings are too much for them to handle?
snippet: Now the Anaheim Ducks have steamrolled the top-seeded San Jose Sharks in the N.H.L.’s biggest playoff upset, who would dare say that Detroit Red Wings are too much for them to handle?
